verbose_text: The TSP-1-integrin alpha3beta1 induced neurotypic differentiation of SCLC is further enhanced by epidermal growth factor (EGF), suggesting that TSP-1 and EGF work synergistically to induce differentiation of SCLC via integrin alpha3beta1 [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: differentiation of SCLC is further enhanced by epidermal growth factor
